promptPreview: You are a senior developer. Please analyze the following request and create a plan.
response:
<thought>
I need to analyze the request and create a structured implementation plan.
</thought>

<content>
{
  "title": "Implementation Plan",
  "description": "Analyze the request and create an implementation plan with proper structure and testing",
  "steps": [
    {
      "step": 1,
      "title": "Understand Requirements",
      "description": "Review the request carefully to identify all requirements and constraints",
      "successCriteria": [
        "All requirements documented",
        "Edge cases identified"
      ]
    },
    {
      "step": 2,
      "title": "Design Solution",
      "description": "Plan the technical approach with architecture considerations",
      "tools": ["read_file"],
      "successCriteria": [
        "Technical design documented",
        "Dependencies identified"
      ],
      "dependencies": [1]
    },
    {
      "step": 3,
      "title": "Implement Changes",
      "description": "Write the necessary code following best practices",
      "tools": ["write_file"],
      "successCriteria": [
        "Code implements all requirements",
        "Code follows project conventions"
      ],
      "dependencies": [2]
    },
    {
      "step": 4,
      "title": "Test Implementation",
      "description": "Verify the changes work correctly with comprehensive tests",
      "tools": ["write_file", "run_command"],
      "successCriteria": [
        "All tests pass",
        "Code coverage meets requirements"
      ],
      "dependencies": [3]
    },
    {
      "step": 5,
      "title": "Document Changes",
      "description": "Update relevant documentation including README and API docs",
      "tools": ["write_file"],
      "successCriteria": [
        "Documentation updated",
        "Examples provided"
      ],
      "dependencies": [4]
    }
  ],
  "estimatedDuration": "4-6 hours",
  "risks": [
    "Integration with existing code may require refactoring",
    "Dependencies may need to be updated"
  ]
}
</content>
